"Partisan Boot Camp I":
"Greetings. I'm Joseph, retired ARKS training officer,
at your service. It seems the top brass thinks you
show promise, so I've been called back temporarily
to make a master partisan user out of you. Partisans
have a long reach, which allows you to attack enemies
in wide areas. They readily hit their mark, but can be
difficult to wield. That makes training that much more
valuable. Let's start by having you show me how you
use the weapon. Your mission? Go face the Garongo.
*Partisans only"

"ごきげんよう。退役教導官のジョーゼフだ。
有望な君を一人前のパルチザン使いに
育て上げるよう、上から言われて来た。
パルチザンはリーチが長い武器で
広範囲に向けて攻撃できる上に
狙いを定めやすいが、扱いは容易でない。
それだけ訓練のしがいがあるとも言える。
まずは君の戦いぶりを見せてもらいたい。
今すぐガロンゴを倒しに出かけたまえ！
※長槍系限定"
